TopicTitle: So when is the Kerbalkon feed?

Articles.Content:
I had seen an image that said December 12-13

but I just went to the page, and it says "Kerbalkon is in -2 days"

so... did I miss it?

DRAT!

I can't find ANY information on it, either!

Don't know where to put this, but I think it's general enough to fall off the front page of the general forum in a few minutes.

It's on the 11th and 12th, last I heard. The page for Kerbalcon has yet to be properly updated for 2013 yet. It even points to the old Twitch feed, which hasn't been used in some time. No worries, you didn't miss it, and you won't likely be able to. The devs are going to no doubt be promoting it heavily within the next week or so.

that's good

and that's also good that you hear it's on the 11'th and 12'th

I want to watch the whole thing

and I have 2 college final exams starting at 8:00am on the 13'th
I stand corrected, it IS the 12th and 13th. There was an image posted in the Thank You thread in the Daily Kerbal forum. When you perform a few filters to expose the hidden message, it reveals this:
Further KerbalKon announcements are imminent, but yes, clear off your calendar for December 12 and 13.

Further KerbalKon announcements are imminent, but yes, clear off your calendar for December 12 and 13.

Calander clear....except from 4-9ish pm on the 12th as I have classes that night.

Yup, I had that image filtered like that mere minutes after the blog post

Now I have another question:

I assume since it says the 12'th to the 13'th, that it might start that thursday afternoon, and extend into friday?

Will this be "recorded" for unfortunate souls like me who have very important things to do quite early in the morning on Friday?

This was a concern of mine, and I couldn't find any archived footage of Kerbalkon 2012... that's going to really suck

the ONE day... I only have 2 final exams!... BOTH of them are on the 13'th!

Further KerbalKon announcements are imminent, but yes, clear off your calendar for December 12 and 13.

I changed flight plans due to this. I was going to be flying in the 12th. I moved it up a day so I'd be somewhere with internet.

I changed flight plans due to this. I was going to be flying in the 12th. I moved it up a day so I'd be somewhere with internet.

That is commitment.
